cast.name: 胡丽叶塔·泽尔贝伯格 Julieta Zylberberg
诺尔曼·布里斯基 Norman Briski
苏珊娜·帕姆平 Susana Pampin
沃尔特·雅各布 Walter Jakob
朱利安·拉基尔·泰拉里尼 Julián Larquier Tellarini

introduction: Javier (Alfonso Tort) and Valeria (Julieta Zylberberg) hug in bed and cannot hide their resignation. For the past six years, and despite the hundreds of studies and exhausting methods she has submitted herself to, they have been trying to have children unsuccessfully. The joy for the purchase of a house doesn’t correspond with true spirits of the couple, frustrated after another visit to the doctor. The relationship falls apart completely after Javier receives some unexpected news—a woman from work with whom he became intimate with on a few occasions during a trip, is pregnant with his baby. Going from the classic tropes of the family melodrama to some subtle and introspective musical sequences, Ariel Rotter’s new film covers maturity, distress, work pressure, deceit and those instances of domestic grief that can still determine a person’s actions.源自：https://www.mardelplatafilmfest.com/38/en/pelicula/un-pajaro-azul
